creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
inscription: Inside of Front cover, black ink pen: hi fly / read this / in a quiet / yet fizzy / mood / and / keep / writing / lv / Dick / (doodle)
medium: Offset lithography, letterpress, decal, bound volume
title: Write The Way Up
